languages.text: {n}Клеменциа сразу же обращается к инфопластине в руках.{/n} "Позвольте доложить — досточтимые навигаторы из Дома Орселлио расположились в гостевом поместье и ожидают встречи с вами. Как пожелаете принять господ?"

traits.locale_text: "Император защищает, и пусть звезды освещают ваш путь!". {n}Клеменциа почтительно кивает и сразу же обращается к инфопластине в руках.{/n} "Позвольте доложить — досточтимые навигаторы из Дома Орселлио расположились в гостевом поместье и ожидают встречи с вами. Как пожелаете принять господ?"

languages.text: {n}Clementia immediately focuses on the data-slate in her hands.{/n} "Allow me to report — the esteemed Navigators of House Orsellio have taken residence in the guest estate and await a meeting with you. How would you like to receive them?"
languages.original_text: {n}Клеменциа сразу же обращается к инфопластине в руках.{/n} "Позвольте доложить — досточтимые навигаторы из Дома Орселлио расположились в гостевом поместье и ожидают встречи с вами. Как пожелаете принять господ?"

traits.locale_text: "The Emperor protects, and may the stars shine upon your path!" {n}Clementia offers you a nod of respect, then immediately focuses on the data-slate in her hands.{/n} "Allow me to report — the esteemed Navigators of House Orsellio have taken residence in the guest estate and await a meeting with you. How would you like to see them?"

"The Emperor protects, and may the stars shine upon your path!" {n}Clementia offers you a nod of respect, then immediately focuses on the data-slate in her hands.{/n} "Allow me to report — the esteemed Navigators of House Orsellio have taken residence in the guest estate and await a meeting with you. How would you like to see them?"

{n}Clementia immediately focuses on the data-slate in her hands.{/n} "Allow me to report — the esteemed Navigators of House Orsellio have taken residence in the guest estate and await a meeting with you. How would you like to receive them?"

languages.text: {n}克莱门缇雅立刻查看起了手中的数据板。{/n}“请允许我向您报告，尊敬的奥赛罗家族的导航者们已经住进了客人庄园，等待着与您会面。您打算如何接待他们？”
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia immediately focuses on the data-slate in her hands.{/n} "Allow me to report — the esteemed Navigators of House Orsellio have taken residence in the guest estate and await a meeting with you. How would you like to receive them?"

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱门缇雅立刻查看起了手中的数据板。{/n}“请允许我向您报告，尊敬的奥塞罗家族的导航者们已经住进了客人庄园，等待着与您会面。您打算如何接待他们？”

languages.text: {n}Clementia se centra inmediatamente en la tablilla de datos que sujeta.{/n} «Permítame que le informe: los estimados navegantes de la casa Orsellio se alojan en la finca de invitados y esperan reunirse con usted. ¿Cómo quiere recibirlos?».
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia immediately focuses on the data-slate in her hands.{/n} "Allow me to report — the esteemed Navigators of House Orsellio have taken residence in the guest estate and await a meeting with you. How would you like to receive them?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia se centra inmediatamente en la tablilla de datos que sujeta.{/n} «Permítame que le informe: los estimados navegantes de la casa Orsellio se alojan en la finca de invitados y esperan reunirse con usted. ¿Cómo quiere recibirlos?».

languages.text: {n}クレメンティアはすぐに手元のデータスレートに目をやった。{/n}「報告いたします。オーセリオ家の航宙士たちは来客用の屋敷に滞在し、陛下との対談を待っております。どのように彼らを迎えますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia immediately focuses on the data-slate in her hands.{/n} "Allow me to report — the esteemed Navigators of House Orsellio have taken residence in the guest estate and await a meeting with you. How would you like to receive them?"

traits.locale_text: {n}クレメンティアはすぐに手元のデータスレートに目をやった。{/n}「報告いたします。オーセリオ家の航宙士たちは来客用の屋敷に滞在し、陛下との対談を待っております。どのように彼らを迎えますか？」

languages.text: {n}Clementia blickt sofort auf den Datablock in ihren Händen.{/n} "Wenn ich berichten darf – die geschätzten Navigatoren des Hauses Orsellio haben das Gästeanwesen bezogen und warten auf ein Zusammentreffen mit Euch. Wie möchtet Ihr sie empfangen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia immediately focuses on the data-slate in her hands.{/n} "Allow me to report — the esteemed Navigators of House Orsellio have taken residence in the guest estate and await a meeting with you. How would you like to receive them?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia blickt sofort auf den Datablock in ihren Händen.{/n} "Wenn ich berichten darf – die geschätzten Navigatoren des Hauses Orsellio haben das Gästeanwesen bezogen und warten auf ein Zusammentreffen mit Euch. Wie möchtet Ihr sie empfangen?"

languages.text: {n}Clémentia se penche immédiatement sur sa plaque de données.{/n} « Les très estimés navigateurs de la maison Orsellio ont pris leurs quartiers dans l'aile des invités et attendent de pouvoir vous rencontrer. Comment souhaitez-vous les recevoir ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia immediately focuses on the data-slate in her hands.{/n} "Allow me to report — the esteemed Navigators of House Orsellio have taken residence in the guest estate and await a meeting with you. How would you like to receive them?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clémentia se penche immédiatement sur sa plaque de données.{/n} « Les très estimés navigateurs de la maison Orsellio ont pris leurs quartiers dans l'aile des invités et attendent de pouvoir vous rencontrer. Comment souhaitez-vous les recevoir ? »

languages.text: {n}Clementia, derhâl elindeki databelaya odaklanıyor.{/n} "Müsaadenizle raporumu bildireyim... Orsellio Hanesi'nin saygın Rotacıları, misafirhaneye yerleşmiş ve sizinle görüşmeyi bekliyor. Acaba onları nasıl ağırlamak istersiniz?"
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia immediately focuses on the data-slate in her hands.{/n} "Allow me to report — the esteemed Navigators of House Orsellio have taken residence in the guest estate and await a meeting with you. How would you like to receive them?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia, derhal elindeki databelaya odaklanıyor.{/n} "Müsaadenizle raporumu bildireyim... Orsellio Hanesi'nin saygın Rotacıları, misafirhaneye yerleşmiş ve sizinle görüşmek için bekliyorlar. Acaba onları nasıl ağırlamak istersiniz?"
